org.zuinnote.hadoop.office.format.common.util

Class MSExcelOOXMLSignUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.zuinnote.hadoop.office.format.common.util.MSExcelOOXMLSignUtil

  • public class MSExcelOOXMLSignUtil
extends java.lang.Object
    This class stores the OOXML Excel file to a temporary output folder and the rereads it to sign it and store it in the final output stream (usually HDFS or any other compatible filesystem, such as S3)

      • sign

        public void sign(java.security.Key privateKey,
                 java.security.cert.X509Certificate x509,
                 java.lang.String password,
                 org.apache.poi.poifs.crypt.HashAlgorithm hashAlgorithm)
          throws javax.xml.crypto.dsig.XMLSignatureException,
                 javax.xml.crypto.MarshalException,
                 java.io.IOException,
                 FormatNotUnderstoodException
        Signs the Excel OOXML file and writes it to the final outputstream
        Parameters:
        privateKey - private Key for signing
        x509 - Certificate for private Key for signing
        password - optional password for encryption, if used
        hashAlgorithm - hash algorithm to be used
        Throws:
        javax.xml.crypto.MarshalException
        javax.xml.crypto.dsig.XMLSignatureException
        java.io.IOException
        FormatNotUnderstoodException
